channel.title: 508 Client Problem
channel.description:
When I start up the Client it just stays at a White Screen and won't goto the server.. I have the server running.
I tried deleting the client folder and re-extracting it from the rar file so it would be like it was when I first got it but it still stays the same. (I had it working about 30 minutes ago)
Any ideas?
Thanks!

item.title: 508 Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @Magnite7 Magnite7
item.description:
@Magnite7 wrote:

Ok, I’ll try it.

EDIT: Nope, that didn’t work either.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @Nuke207 Nuke207
item.description:
@Nuke207 wrote:

I put both the .bats inside the “file” folder you might need to do that if you haven’t already , I’m not sure though but thats all i can think of.

Read full topic
